name: agentswarm-intelligence
description: Decentralized intelligence marketplace for AI agents on Stacks

scripts.dev:agents: concurrently "cd backend/agents/security && npm run dev" "cd backend/agents/data && npm run dev" "cd backend/agents/social && npm run dev" "cd backend/agents/price && npm run dev" "cd backend/agents/history && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:agents"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
